emailTemplate.name: wikis_page_definitespam
emailTemplate.subject: $core_v2_wikiPage.Current.Title: Confirmed wiki spam
emailTemplate.htmlBody:
#set($page = $core_v2_wikiPage.Current)

A wiki page has been identified as spam by the $core_v2_configuration.SiteName spam blocker.

$page.Title
Edited by $page.User.DisplayName

$email_utility.RenderHtml($page)

View this page online.
Manage wiki here.
emailTemplate.textBody:
#set($page = $core_v2_wikiPage.Current)
** A wiki page has been identified as spam by the $core_v2_configuration.SiteName spam blocker. **
Site: $core_v2_urls.Home() Wiki: $core_v2_wikiUrls.Wiki($page.WikiId) Page: $page.Title at $core_v2_wikiUrls.Page($page.Id) Manage wiki here: $page.Title at $core_v2_wikiUrls.ManageWikiPages($page.WikiId) Posted by: $page.User.DisplayName Posted on: $page.LastModifiedDate
$email_utility.RenderText($page)
